show.title: PineTalk Podcast
show.subtitle: A Community Podcast
show.summary:
We discuss PINE64 hardware, software and open source in general.
Send in your questions!
A community ran podcast for the community.

Contact:
Email: pinetalk@pine64.org
Twitter: @TalkPine

title: 004: GPU-o-Rama
subtitle: In the fourth episode of PineTalk, Ezra and Peter discuss some industry and community news, go through your favourite answers to their question and answer a few of your questions, some of them (spoiler!) GPU related.
summary:
In the fourth episode of PineTalk, Ezra and Peter discuss some industry and community news, go through your favourite answers to their question and answer a few of your questions, some of them (spoiler!) GPU related.
Remember: This is a community podcast, so please leave feedback on what we should do better, get your suggestion's in and feel free to ask questions!

chapters.title: What have we been up to lately?
What would you like to see Pine64 make?
